snippet: Viktor Tikhonov scored two first-period goals and added an assist to lead Russia to a 4-1 victory over Latvia and a spot in the quarterfinals of the world championship in Minsk, Belarus.
abstract: Russia defeats Latvia, 4-1, earning a spot in the quarterfinals of the hockey world championship in Minsk, Belarus.
lead_paragraph: Viktor Tikhonov scored two first-period goals and added an assist to lead Russia to a 4-1 victory over Latvia and a spot in the quarterfinals of the world championship in Minsk, Belarus.

headline.main: Russia Beats Latvia, Advancing to Quarterfinals of World Championship
